2.0.0-alpha2.name: drupal/simple_ldap_active_group

security-coverage.message: Alpha releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

2.0.0-alpha2.description: Adds a user to the defined LDAP group when set to "Active" and removes the user from the group when set to "Blocked". This module is best used when a search filter is set in Simple Ldap User to enforce group membership. "memberOf=cn=active,ou=groups,o=example" for example.
